name: Combat Wombat
overview: Help Combat Wombat in his battle against evil! Guide him through each scene, defeating Crossley Hill High School bully Buzzer Boyd, and collecting bowls of Angel Delight for extra points. Once you have completed one loop of the game, you will start again only now The Fugue will also try to attack Combat Wombat. Each loop adds another Fugue demon to the screen. Combat Wombat started as a fictional game in Dan Whitehead's graphic novel "Hexloader". It was created later and released as a freebie to the book.
